snippet: Mie Hama, a former Japanese film star who appeared in the 1967 James Bond film “You Only Live Twice,” on why she decided to leave Hollywood behind....

headline.main: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens
headline.print_headline: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens

lead_paragraph: Mie Hama, a former Japanese film star who appeared in the 1967 James Bond film “You Only Live Twice,” on why she decided to leave Hollywood behind.
